channel.title: Christ Church Bromley sermons
channel.description: The latest sermon of the regular morning and evening services. Christ Church holds a morning and an evening service every Sunday. During the 10.30 service, there is a creche and various groups for children. Coffee is available afterwards. fter the 7.30 service drinks, snacks and hot dogs are available from the R & E cafe. Please contact the church office: office@ccbromley.net or +44 (0) 20 8464 1898.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Sermon recordings from Christ Church Bromley in London, United Kingdom
